title: METHOD, DEVICE-TO-DEVICE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, SECOND DEVICE, COMPUTER PROGRAM, AND PROCESSING CIRCUIT FOR PROVIDING ASSISTANCE INFORMATION
fig_desc: [Fig. 10a]Figure 10a relates to the present disclosure and especially relate to various ways of selecting candidates, among receivers, for emitting assistance information towards a transmitter
